```{python}
#| echo: false
import pandas as pd
```

```{python}
#| echo: false
filename = './_data/members.csv'
column_dtypes={'name':'string',
               'type':'category',
               'current':'boolean',
               'start':'UInt16',
               'end':'UInt16',
               'grad':'UInt16',
               'degree':'string', # TODO should be category
               'now':'string',
               'photo':'string'}
df = pd.read_csv(filename,dtype=column_dtypes)

#df
```

### Current members
```{python}
#| echo: false
these_columns = ['name','start','now','degree']
df[df['current'] & (df['type']=='UG')][these_columns].sort_values(by='start',ascending=False).style.hide(axis="index")
```

### Past members
```{python}
#| echo: false
these_columns = ['name','start','end','degree','grad','now']
df[~df['current'] ][these_columns].sort_values(by='grad',ascending=False).style.hide(axis="index")
```

### Collaborators
```{python}
#| echo: false
these_columns = ['name','start','now']
df[df['type']=='C'][these_columns].sort_values(by='start',ascending=True).style.hide(axis="index")
```
